title: Humorous line...
content:
"Font rights are an issue. (I believe all fonts are born with certain inalienable rights: life, ligatures, and the pursuit of happiness. But I digress.)..."

-Mike Rankin on "InDesignSecrets.com"  
 [http://indesignsecrets.com/tools-of-change-notes-xml-in-practice.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016222220/http:/indesignsecrets.com/tools-of-change-notes-xml-in-practice.php "http://indesignsecrets.com/tools-of-change-notes-xml-in-practice.php")

"Font rights are an issue" is fairly apt in light of all the recent "open source" font threads...
author: bemerx25

comments.content: I had the pleasure of working with Mike Rankin back in the 90s. His unique sense of humor was apparent even then. I still have a cartoon he drew of Yoda working in Quark and declaiming, "Kerning, hah! Tracking, hah! A Jedi craves not these things.!"
